freemarker.template

接口 TemplateNodeModelEx

  • 所有超级接口:
    TemplateModel, TemplateNodeModel
    所有已知实现类:
    NodeModel

    public interface TemplateNodeModelEx
extends TemplateNodeModel
    A TemplateNodeModel that supports navigating to the previous and next sibling nodes.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.3.26

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 freemarker.template.TemplateModel

        NOTHING

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      TemplateNodeModelEx getPreviousSibling()

        getChildNodes, getNodeName, getNodeNamespace, getNodeType, getParentNode

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPreviousSibling

        TemplateNodeModelEx getPreviousSibling()
                                throws TemplateModelException
        返回:
        The immediate previous sibling of this node, or null if there's no such node.
        抛出:
        TemplateModelException

      • getNextSibling

        TemplateNodeModelEx getNextSibling()
                            throws TemplateModelException
        返回:
        The immediate next sibling of this node, or null if there's no such node.
        抛出:
        TemplateModelException
